casebody.data:
COLONIAL INVESTORS, LLC
v.
Lois FURBUSH et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 21, 2017

David A. Pels, Hartford, and Giovanna Shay, in support of the petition.

Thomas T. Lonardo, Meriden, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 154, 167 A.3d 987 (2017), is denied.
